metadata.description: every object must have the following metadata in a nested object field called 'metadata'

name.description: a string that uniquely identifies the resource

description.description: a detailed description of the resource
description.example: this logical cloud is part of the CA cert

spec.description: specification is a complete description of the desired state

logicalCloud.description: a string that identifies the specific logical cloud

userData.description: extended data associated with the resource
